g.text: . Subsurface cation vacancy stabilization of the magnetite (001) surface.
. Scattering Dynamics of Hydrogen Molecules on Metal Alloy Surfaces –Probing Local Surface Reactivity with
44. Diño, W. A. Can we probe local surface reactivity with hydrogen molecules?
45. Kresse, G. & Joubert, D. From ultrasoft pseudopotentials to the projector augmented-wave method.
. Atoms, molecules, solids, and surfaces: Applications of the generalized gradient approximation for exchange and
48. Perdew, J. P., Burke, K. & Ernzerhof, M. Generalized Gradient Approximation Made Simple.
49. Perdew, J. P., Burke, K. & Ernzerhof, M. Erratum.

This work is supported in part by MEXT Grants-in-Aid for Scientific Research (JP17K06818, JP17H01057,
JP15H03677, JP15K13504, JP15H05736, JP15KT0062, JP15K14147, JP26248006). Some of the numerical
calculations presented here were done using the computer facilities at the following institutes: CMC (Osaka
University), ISSP, KEK, NIFS, and YITP. J.S.G. acknowledges support from DOST and MEXT.
S.M. and M.O. conceived the experiment(s). R.A. and T.M. conducted the experiments. J.S.G. performed the DFT
calculations. S.M., M.O. and W.A.D. drafted the manuscript. All authors contributed to the analyses of results and
The authors declare no competing interests.
